description: Our colleagues in the opinion department of the International Herald Tribune — and some very illustrious guests — look ahead to 2013, and find that even if great storms are rising, they are no reason to be forlorn.
title: The IHT Global Agenda Magazine: What to Expect in 2013
title_page: The IHT Global Agenda Magazine: What to Expect in 2013 - The New York Times
text:
Photo
Our colleagues in the opinion department of the International Herald Tribune — and some very illustrious guests — look ahead to 2013, and find that even if great storms are rising, they are no reason to be forlorn. Read their thought-provoking magazine.
